content: Great game but has some compatibility issues with modern versions of android, although it is mostly still playable it sometimes crashes or fails to save career progress.
This is the best pool game but after you get to the boss there is no were to go.
Poor port of a great game. No sound. The old windows mobile version from 20 years ago was better.
Best pool and snooker game. Love the intuitive stroking motion for power control.
It is the most realistic pool game I've ever found.
the best
It really could do with a 2 player game with bluetooth between phones.
Fun app, almost like the n64 Virtual Pool.
Must realistic cue game. If you play in real life, you will like it. The angles and sightings are close to real.
The most realistic pool game on the market. They've managed to replicate the feel of a cue using your finger tip to create an awesome playing experience
Never worked the way it was designed. Please update
I have been installing this game since I had my first android phone and have installed it on everyone new phone I have had since. I still have not found a better pool game for mobile.
Very good for pool billiards. Like tge PC version when will we get Snooker, 3 Cushion and English Billiards? Then I would rate 5*
I like the 2D graphics and the game is fairly easy to play, I've made it to the forth room so far.
Best pool product at any price. Would like to see ability to upgrade cues and to customize table attributes.
Still the best pool game out there. Under rated.

This was better on a 2007 PDA! Please allow for a 4:3 ratio or settings to choose a less wide view because a super wide aspect ratio means a very low angle view when taking a shot. I will change review when it's fixed.
Had this game since the PC version many many years back. Although the app version has limited functionality, it's still fantastic. No other pool app comes anywhere near the virtual 3d aspects.
Best pool game by far
Disappointing game for Â£1.60. have played vp4 on pc and enjoyed it. Downloaded this as I thought it would be similar, however completed the career mode in two days.

The best no BS pool game in the app store. This is an oldie and has always had a good reputation even when it was released many years ago. The interface is very simple, the physics feel accurate and the control of the cue is spot on. I've played so many pool games in my life, from one device to another and console to console. There are many out there and the best ones tend to get overlooked. VPM is the best on android. Well worth your 2 dollars. My only gripe is the AI. They're super dumb.
Can't turn off aim assist _ I did a reinstall to a new galaxy tab A 10.1 and it won't turn off. Not sure what the developers can do

Had this since day 1 still have it now, imo best pool game. Mechanics are realistic, Graphics are decent. OK why not 5star... No online on android, online on iPhone is temperamental. Also rules not accurate in 9ball or straight pool. There is a bug which randomly makes you loose career matches which is very very frustrating... Fix the bug and its 5 stars all day!
Been using this for years now - absolutely brilliant.

its an ok game but the battery usage even after you stop playing is ridiculous,, i went to bed with my phone at 100% like i do everynight but instead of waking up to it at 99% , it was at 74% ,,the battery usage said that it runs in the background continuously...so bye , bye, pool game....NOT WORTH THE MONEY I PAID FOR IT....

Apart from a bug in straight pool where it loses me against Curly when well ahead. Despite this one of the best game ever but unfortunately shame it hasn't been updated for a while. However please add Push Out button after the break off for 9 ball or similar games. Also, a must.. please also add new much tougher opponents. Better graphics with tournament and league play and better rankings!
best pool game ever
Best pool game by far on mobile, pc & console....

Played the original decades ago, and went looking for a mobile game recently. Nothing else comes close. The graphics are much better on the free games and their multiplayer is fun, but this game is a full-on simulator while the others are all toys. Over 20 years later and Virtual Pool is still the most realistic billiards game on the market.
brilliant
This is the best simulator out on android right now. the only thing missing is online play and a ball set up practice mode.

Looks like virtual pool. The physics seem about right. But the interface leaves a LOT to be desired. 1) No indicator for the point of contact of the cue on the cue ball. When applying spin you are just guessing. 2) Camera only rotates around cue ball or else overhead. No way to move it around to look at the whole table. 3) No way to call a shot or nominate a pocket. 4) In practice 14.1, new racks don't appear. 5) No pushout in 9-ball. etc. Basically it LOOKS like pool, but isn't really.
I'm a huge fan of Virtual Pool, but on my LG Stylo 3 it started freezing in the 5th round. If you have any suggestions to fix this I'll gladly give you 5 stars.

If you love playing pool this is the best pool app!  Accurate ball physics, very realistic.  I actually think this game has helped my real game.  Will definitely help your pattern play.  Only cons would be a couple of glitches, no online play, bad AI opponents and some game rules (example 10-ball).  Gave it a 5 star despite shortcomings because it's still the most realistic game  available.  Would like to see short rail banks and one pocket included.
It's great but I think an online player interface must be added

Been playing this game for years on pc. It's the same game on mobile and 
it's awesome.
So far the best i found..This would be great for multiplayer and leagues,but there is non..Very dissapointed in this..
Brilliant physics. I've been playing this series for years, the simulation is still top notch.
Great
Put simply, the best pool sim ever made. So intuitive it improves your actual game
The sound does not work on a galaxy s8
Still the best when it comes to realism. A VP4 port would be even better.
No Snooker?? BTW Really loved it maybe little less than the pc game though as i play vp4. Waiting for more features
A fantastic pool game. Excellent physics modeling, natural controls, smooth frame rate. A joy to play.

Would be awesome if I did not lose when the score is 5 to 1 in the early stages of a 14.1 game when racing to 25 points. I make 5 shots and then miss, for missing I lose the game??? This happens a lot.

Still the best physics of Annie  phone version of  pool game . I can tell the AI is helping me make shots. I can understand that because it's for use on phones of all sizes. I just missed the perfect physics of the PC version which allows the ball to meet the table and feels like a real game. Including the AI players who feel like they are making the same mistakes a real-world opponent would make on the Android version VA is clearly throwing the game by making a bad mistake to give you a chance to catch up and win.  After beating career play changing to quick play my game is stuck at the setting of one game rounds but all games are eleven rounds. And I cannot change the number of rounds when I do the game crashes. In spite of all these disappointments this is still best pool game available on any portable format

When you have a player assigned to play 6 ball and another to play 8 ball and you pause 8 ball when you go back to resume that game it comes up with the 6 ball player and gives the credit to that player, which makes it harder to build up to the next table level. Can you fix that?  Also it seems to me the default English is high, it would be nice if that was not true, but, rather it would be best if the default position was dead center.  You also need to be able to pause the game when the computer is shooting
Great graphics but on iPhone you can play online fix this please and 5 stars guaranteed
Gutted, game plays great, just like PC version, but I couldn't get any sound during the game (only in cut scenes). This was a deal breaker for me, had to refund :(
Great game
If a game can't be moved to the SD card, it's useless.

Loved the p.c. version and have been waiting for it to come to android. There are a couple of problems, though. No push out option. In 8 ball, table should be open if a ball or balls are sunk on the break. Sometimes in career mode you win matches but do not make any money. I had to beat the Hammer four times in 8 Ball before making any money and unlocking Deep Pockets.
It's more challenging in ios " slow roll"  is too sloppy
This app is good but it quits game when ever it wants to and says you lose even when your in the lead. I would like to see this glitch fixxed
I can't raise or lower the stick elevation angle. Can't make big masse or jump shots! It's been so long, please update!!
I love this game but would be better if it was just like virtual pool 3 on PC because of the game has snooker online play pool 9 ball 8 ball UK ect
I love and Greg Finley is the best a real inspiration later Dan Spokane from Spokane
This has always been my favorite game on PC and I am happy they have managed to bring across the same excellent gameplay onto mobile platform too.
What is goin on???? Win a match and it tells me i LOST??????? Fix the bugs please!!!!!
Yeah, needs sound.
Finally this legendary pool game available for Android! The one and only!
Could have better controls on android, but if you're serious, don't bother with other apps. The physics is just great in this game!
I've had this on my phone for quite sometime....great graphics and game play. Recommended!
I'm playing computer in straight pool and it's a race to 75. I'm ahead 71 to 33. Next thing you know it says I lost and he shot 1 more ball in. This happens alot and it's extremely frustrating!!
Had this game on iPhone long ago, was glad could get it on Android. Only problem is no sound effects.  I know there aren't many of them, so please see what you can do :D
So great to have this on mobile!
Pretty much Real

Excellent work! But I need 1 setting to make it playable for me. The camera keeps jumping out as soon as I hit the cue ball, but I like / need to see the reaction from the same view while I hit it. I can do without changing the table colour or the undo option, but if I can't see the shot I just took from where I shot it, I can't learn or enjoy it. Please add this option!!
Sometimes it doesn't give you your winnings

Had this running on my IPhone for 2 years with no problems. On my s5, I lose games after a couple of shots and I can't generate as much power as my IPhone. Fix that and you get 5 stars. OK, you've fixed the problem with generating power. But I have just potted 27 balls and the game is the 1st to pot 90, you pot 2 and I lose??? Something wrong there or am I wrong? Love the game but that problem can get irritating. Best game on the market
I dont get my winnings! Im stucked with $390,+++ please fix this!

Lovely graphics,great controls,nice atmosphere.the best pool game I've played on the play store,but unfortunately a lot of the time the game says I have lost even when I have won,or was winning!in career mode I have money deducted even when I won the match!please sort this out developers because without the bugs,this is easily a five star game.
Great game... You won't be disappointed!
Disappointing, since the ios version has excellent matchmaking feature.

Excellent game.  I play on ZTE Android. I have had only two problems - sometimes game freezes (no big deal), but often I'm ahead and all of a sudden I lose the match.  Oh well, I'm up 70 million on straight pool so I won't complain too much.  Still good enough for five stars. Graphics, sound effects etc.  as some have complained about could always improve but for pool game app this is very good and well done.
The AI shoots great and then ? Shoots retarted on the last ball. Also they have no game strategy. Needs shot  replay. This is the best pool there is!
This game has the worst AI I've ever seen in a poolgame.you've got A ranked players missing 2 inch straight -in money shots.it robs the game of any pleasure it might have had otherwise.
Top game and is really good without the easy guide like most people want its to easy to have that knowing the balls will go in  hate it like that

I regret buying this game after being used to the PC version. The AI engine is wowfully inadequate and its shot selections are just ridiculous. The physics are good but UI and game features are very poor.
Plays super
After playing this on iPhone for years I thought I would get the android version but it's no where near as good
I have this game for the pc, iphone, iPad and now the HTC one.   I am very disappointed in the game . The game lags horifically; even after changes my settings to low detail.
replyContent: This is corrected in the latest update.

content: Best, most realistic pool game on any platform
This VP4 game uses a lot of Battery to play on Droid RAZR MAXX HD cell phone.
I play a multitude of pool games and this is the most realistic hands down. This is available for PC and mobile.

It's the best (closest to real physics) 3D pool game/simulator you can find on Android and PC. Graphics are a bit lacking, especially the UI is subpar for an app in 2014, but the game's physics engine makes up for that.
The problems I described, complete failure and poor speed control, have been fixed with an update. Thanks.
Virtual pool
The best. It really will make your game better.
The best pool game ever. On PC and on Mobile.
Having played most of the Virtual Pool series on PC this was a must have. Works great with the touch screen and runs without any slowdowns, even on my old phone it ran amazingly.
U/S dose not work I paid for this as well!!
Great game....however latest lolipop update on Nexus 10 causes the game to crash...looking for a fix

This game has the brilliant physics of the PC version with the exception that it sorely misses cue angle adjustments and jump shots (that were introduced a very long time ago in PC engine). However, the gameplay and experience are not polished, most importantly, the CPU ability is woeful and does not present any kind of challenge, even at the hardest setting. It seems like the cpu players deliberately miss key shots which is really disappointing and takes the joy from the game.
If you want to play a realistic game , this is the one for you !
Just download it.the only thing it needs is online play.
Very realistic, good graphics, computer could be harder on "good luck" setting, but otherwise a great app
This game is crap ( this version) it awards games to the other player when clearly lost I've removed from my phone
Great physics. Love that i can hit the ball really fast. The carreer mode is a fun idea. Even includes Videos making it more immersive and fun.

Very well written game. I wish the developers would include some of the features found in older versions though. I loved playing this game on my old nokia phone and it had features like zip to end, and replay. Zip to end is for fast forwarding through the computers shots until they miss and its your turn. Replay was by far the most useful feature. Whenever you miss, hit replay and figure out how you shot the ball wrong and learn for next time.

Recently switched to android and enjoyed this game tremendously on iOS, so I spent the money to get it here. However I found that this version is missing some basic options, like CPU difficulty and sound controls. More importantly, the game is EXTREMELY buggy. Twice in career mode I beat an opponent to find the game said I inexplicably lost or started over all together. The game crashes constantly, and I often can't switch to another app without this one crashing.
One of the best games in terms of physics and game play but it glitches to the point you're lucky to be paid for your matches 50% of the time which ruins the story progression
Has some bugs like cue Stucks at a wrong position and when pull back the cue stick just plays without any power
I have been playing this since the first Iphone and it is still better than any here. Playing this more than doubled my skill on a real pool table with more than 25 years experience.
Best pool game I've tried for sure. Worth the $2. Pool Break is pretty cool too, but the aiming system is jumpy which makes it inferior to Virtual Pool.

Flawless. But still needs online multiplayer option along with Snooker game like on IOS.  Come on guys. Why the double standards? Anyone needing a comparison with the only other decent game Pool Break, Virtual Pool wipes the floor with it. Try the trials for both before purchasing.
White ball rolls too much and sometimes playing the bosses ill be winning by loads and suddenly theyll win, usually a lot of money. good game otherwise
Good game I even think its better then the PC version.   :-)
A really great game I can't say enough about it.---------- it's really good
Game needs Online multiplayer and Offline Local WiFi and Bluetooth multiplayer modes
wish it had the music from the dos version,  but that's ok I have the original on cd and its installed on my 486.
The BEST!
Excellent
Just beautiful
Go for it! So cool
Ciao
Love the game great app..
How do you adjust cue angle? Pls reply.
Love it
Brilliant on n4 phone. Opens then instance crashes on the n10 tablet.
Do not buy if u have android and want to play online against your friends. Coz u cant. Would be perfect in everyway if you could.  No refunds neither
Very good game. Will rate 5 stars as soon as there is online multiplayer support and maybe snooker. I can live without snooker. Also the cue angle needs to be added to play massÃ© shots.

I've played the VP games on PC for over a decade,  and they are always the best billiard games.   The Android version is simply terrible. Ridiculous lack of options,  plain graphics,  and a lot menu. The only positives are that it controls nicely,  and it runs well.  But this can also be six of the FAR superior Pool Break Pro.  So get that game instead.   No refunds,  so I paid only to find out how bad it is   and to store this review.   Again,  the  PC versions beats all others.  This one is crap.
Great !!!
This game is the best way to loose hours of your life without realising it! If you don't do any other games, do this one! Amazing, keep up the good work guys!
Thanks
Excellent plays like the real game

Fantastic game on PC but on android devices such as Sony experia ray and Pipo Chinese tablet I can't advance because sometimes when I clearly win a game the comp says I lost and takes my money....... WHY !

Had this for PC ages ago and was happy to see it available for my nexus 4. The very first break off and it lagged massively making a horrible noise. Seen if run ok on an S3 so am a bit gutted to say the least! Seems to have issues with the break off shot and hard shots in general.
replyContent: This is corrected in the latest update.

content: I always gives 5 star , great graphic,  great experience, Learning simple & smooth game in any device
Have played this since an old PC version, but can you fix the bug that happens if you pause a career - when you later resume and win, it doesn't register and you don't get the cash.
Love the game but it lags on my phone. Runs smooth for 2 secs then freezes 2secs...  Runs fine for a while after reboot. Friend has HTC One and it's the same on theirs.
Please fix this, it was very good on my desire S but on my one it lags all the time. Please read the comments as your average rating is coming down!
replyContent: This is corrected in the latest update.

content: Played smooth on my t-bolt, loved it, but now on gs3 it's so laggy it's unplayable. Please fix!

Excellent graphics and realistic game play.   One problem I've encountered , though,  is that on several games of 9-ball,  the 9 ball disappears.   The game continues  as if the ball is on the table but you can't see it.   I will give it a 5 star rating if this is fixed.
Had some issues on my Nexus 4, but the developer was quick to sort them out. This is as good as pool gets on mobile.
replyContent: Please send the video to support@celeris.com

content: Best pool game around. Would love to be able to skip through the CPU's shots though :-)
This game has been around since the days of DOS on the PC. Its always had great graphics and play.
I like what I've been able to play with the game, but it seems to have severe issues with jellybean 4.2.2, recent updates still haven't fixed this.
replyContent: Nobody else has reported any issues on 4.2.2. Email support@celeris.com with details of what does not work on your Nexus 10.

content: Thank you.  The only feature I wish it had was to show your pocketed balls like you would see in a coin op bar pool table.

Edit: As promised updated to 5 stars thanks to developers quick response at posting working fix. Thanks alot Celeris. Happy customer here!    Easily my favourite pool game on all formats so was really disappointed to find out it doesn't work on my new phone. Just get a garbled screen in game.  Will update this review to a 5 if this ever gets resolved.
The controls, camera views and physics are the best by far.
Totally disappointed that my   favourite game  doesn't work on the S4.  UPDATE: Fixed two days after my complaint. You guys rule!  No wonder I have been playing this game for almost ten years.

This has the most realistic physics of any pool game by a country mile. I had this on iPhone and loved it then, now on Nexus 7 it's the same game with the videos of Curly and everything. If you invest time in this game it will reward. You have to play through the weaker opponents in career mode until you get to the championship tables which are bigger and faster. I play this loads and don't get tired of it because the physics are so excellent. Best pool game by miles, and free! Nothing else comes close. Download it today!

Does not run well on my Nexus 4. The computer shoots fine, but when I shoot, it freezes and does not show the shot that I took. It ran good on my S3 when I had that phone and it runs great on my galaxy tab 2but on my Nexus 4, it's horrible.
Works fine.
Bugs out on the S4. Wasted my money.I'm
Simply the best pool game on your phone
Doesn't support 1080p. And developers said tuff. Don't buy ever. Tried HTC one, galaxy s4. Arrogant developer please don't buy
replyContent: Fix is posted. We never responded to you, think you must have us confused with another developer.

content: Constantly crashes on my Samsung Google Nexus 10 = REFUND
Random pool games. Fun and fun.
I'm so disappointed bc I loved this game on the iphone but now on the s3, even though the graphics are better,  its freakin so laggy!! Please celeris help us out or you'll lose more fans.
It wouldn't play on my brand new HTC one. Not very happy
This is great, real pool aiming and stroke, if you cant aim in 'real life' pool you will learn with the aiming aids in the first part of the game. if you can aim in 'real life' pool this is a buzz!
This game was perfect before the latest AT&T update for my gs3. Now it is very glitchy and hard to play smooth. Please update and it will be 5 stars.
Its a great game
No answers from support.  Doesnt work on my tablet.  View is always cut short if shooting from rails.  Impossible to judge speed or effects. Table seems to have no friction.  Game is just frustrating

This haves to be the best billiards game out there.Great physics for an android game but the pc version is much better though.I would have giving this game 5 stars ,and like everyone stated there is no online option.I also purchased  Pool Break Pro which is not bad ,not as good as this but at least it haves online gaming

Dear celeris, I loved virtual pool for the iPhone, however the natural feel of play is sort of gone because the minimum angle of the cue with the table is way too high. Also, changing the spin should absolutely not change the cue angle with the table!  What happened? ?

The help section needs improvement if it's going to be of use for anyone new to the game. The playability is good. If you accidentally press the back button it closes the game without warning and you'll have to start over. I'll give it 5 stars when these issues are fixed.  Galaxy S II
Cracking conversion of Virtual Pool 3, runs very smoothly on S3. Controls are slightly complicated, but that's unavoidable given the nature of the game.
Just bought this, can't get by licence error screen so unfortunately uninstalled and get my money back

Have bought every version of VP to date, and this is by far the most disappointing. Biggest gripe is that progress in a match is lost if you leave the app and then come back. Changes to controls and views (compared to iOS) make no sense. Hard to get complete down the table view when close to cushion. When in overhead view, you can't adjust aim like you can in all other versions (touching screen just does a useless zoom). Also needs online play. iOS version = perfect. Android = could do better.
This is an old school port from the Windows mobile days 2006'ish and plays so much better than others I've played. Hats off and top marks.
Licence error....  cannot play.

The A.I. difficulty is broken and seems stuck on easy, mailed dev and was told an update to fix this has been implemented for iOS but not android.... Why! Shameful treatment of android users..... Do not buy.
I bought it and wouldnt let me download or refund
Still glitching on jellybean 4.1.1

This game plays beautifully. The graphics and physics are terrific on my Nexus 7. I love the way the balls reflect the surroundings and how you see the spin. Very well done. I don't particularly like the way the ball just disappears in to the pocket. It's not really consistent.  The career mode is a bit too easy. Even on hard mode. The opponents make some ridiculous shots far too often. Although I enjoy winning I feel I should get punished on occasion.  And please add a tournament mode.  Well worth it.
The phone updated to android 4.1.1 and it started lagging.  stops and go, how can we fix the issue? I like the app. Maybe an update might fix the issue..
This needs online option.. it would be amazing ... ipod version has got the online option.. so why cant android have the option.. please update x
To be able to elevate the butt of the cue would be nice, that and the option of the push shot off break oh and online play would be fun too... Curly is a bit easy to beat.... Make him better!

I rate this a 4 star. I love the physics of the game. Very life like.. Easy to pick up and play.. I only doc it 1 star because it requires the internet to play. I shouldn't need the internet to play a single player game... Especially since this is a paid app..
As with all celeris virtual pool games, on various platforms, this is another classic pool game. Great gfx, great controls, great price.
Best graphics I've seen... Nice job on the physics.   Controls are a little difficult, but I'm learning.
Can you play this game online..I have a galaxy s blaze I see no option to play online... my friend has a iPhone and he plays online that's the only reason I download it is to play online..
Best pool game but needs online still gets 5 star's
May annoy real pool players; 8-ball rules non-standard with no options to change.
Poor game... No refund option

Virtual Pool Mobile plays much like the PC games of old, with the exception that it is nowhere near as customisable. It also doesn't allow for selecting between US and UK rules, which will undoubtedly frustrate other UK users, like it did me.
Licensing error BS! Pain in the A** Liked the lack of permissions but don't have time to waste on games that wont play AFTER my credit card was charged!
Lag makes the game in playable.
Awesome game is AWESOME

I have played every vp game made. Nobody makes pool games that competes with these games. I have tried more pool games on android than i can count and this one is, by far, the best. The only complaint i could even remotely come up with is i wish it had online play. With online play there would not be enough stars in the sky to rate this classic. Thank you for bringing this game to android. Worth every penny :-)
I have installed on my PC and ipad. I've never checked if available on Android until now and I'm extremely happy to install. Thanks Celeris, thanks

graphics and physics are awesome. runs great on lower end and higher end devices and it is very stable. unless you unlock other levels all you get is just a barbox. i don't really care about the career mode and such, i just want to get on a nice 9 footer and practice!  so please make that available without having to unlock stuff.
A very fun game

This is a really great pool game. I recently tried many different pool games on Android, and this one is by far the best.  The graphics are great, the performance is great, and the drain on my battery is minimal for a game with graphics and performance of this quality.
Sometimes its difficult to get a low enough 3D view when the ball is a long way and you want to see the end of the table-
Really helps my real game!
Great looking, but lags heavily with strange beep sounds.
Low res icons 2D gfx look terrible and stretched on an HD screen.

Best pool sim by far on any platform BUT really needs the online play available on other platforms. Loses it's long-term appeal without it. First game I downloaded on android, but having already owned it on iOS, I probably wouldn't have bought it again had I bothered to check about multiplayer.
Fantastic game. The best on the market in my opinion. The only game the really feels like the real thing. Was sad to discover that this version has no online play. Maybe it will appear in an update.
The original was the best ever! This is it's evil little brother! No touch, no feel, no online! Crud

Love this game. I play it all the time. Graphics are way better than I was expecting. Only gave it 4 stars because I would like an online feature. Otherwise it's one of the best purchases I have made.
Hours of fun! Worth the money.
I have this on my Skyrocket and although the graphics and the physics are great, it needs to have online play like it does on iOS because it gets boring after a while.
Loved it on iPhone and even better on the Samsung Galaxy Note!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I HAD THIS  ON A DISC. I LOVE THIS GAME.

I run a major pool tour and totally love the game, playing almost everyday so I really shouldn't be using my spare time playing pool on my Android :) But I couldn't resist trying this and i'm blown away by the realism. Stunning graphics too. Awesome!

I played Virtual Pool 1,2,3 on the PC and loved them.  They were well made, full of nice features, and, true to advertising, would actually improve your real life pool playing.  Virtual Pool Mobile is a great app.  If your phone can run it smoothly, I cannot recommend it enough.    The controls are intuitive.  The graphics are quite good.  It has accurate physics and while it won't necessarily make you a better pool player, it will give you an enjoyable experience.

I love this game. I have owned all three previous PC versions of this game, and this mobile version is very similar to the mist recent version. If I were going to make any changes to this game, I would add an option in the settings to turn off the sound. There are time I would like to play the game and listen to music on my tablet, but the game sound is so loud that it overpowers the music. I love playing this on my Archos 10.1" tablet screen. It really shows off the graphics. If I could turn off the sound, this would be a five-star rating!
Incredible visuals
You could pay 10 times this amount for Hustle Kings on the PS Vita and its nowhere near as good... If you like pool you need this game!
Best pool game ever!
Plays really well on Advent Vega. No probs at all. Addictive :-) .

I remember playing this years ago on the PC.  It translated to Android much better than I would have expected. Great fun.  Would love to see the red and yellow balls of UK 8-ball added as a game mode though! And it currently lacks moving to the SD card but I see on their forums that that will be coming soon.
Great game, just like VP3 back in the day. Would like to see some stats so I can see, for instance, what the biggest run is that I had in straight pool, etc.
ZERO complaints! Great graphics, easy to play, fun, fun, fun!!!
The closest thing to shooting pool aside from having a cue in your hand
I didnt like this when I first downloaded it, but now I love it. Best game. You have to get the career going on to get the cool aim assist thing.
Fun Fun Fun!!!!!
Always played these games, was addicted on my iphone. Now i have an android and first game i downloaded!! However, why cant i play online ?? ? ?
Crashes every time I try to rack a game. Have yet to actually play it.
Even better than it is on my ipod. Masterly use of touch controls. Best pool game on Android by far.

Please bring it to PC version of VP2 level!!! Love it but it misses some must have features available in VP2 for PC: 1) Butt Angle. 2) End Action 3)  Really needs Multi-touch support since it is very annoying to;; constantly toggle between "Spin"/"Overhead"/"Zoom"/"Move ball" modes. It will be much comfortable to be in the desired mode only while holding the corresponding button. 4) Replay could be very useful also since it lets you to see your mistakes. VP is amazing! Thank you!

Easily the most realistic billiards game on the market, in terms of physics. Menus need some improvement and more game types would be nice too. Snooker, perhaps?
Fantastic game. Nearly as good as PC version. Runs very smoothly on Ericsson Neo. A must buy.
Great game
As a huge fan of Virtual Pool 3 on PC, this was a must have for me and it's easily as good but it needs the implementation of Snooker.
Absolutely fantastic game. Great fluid graphics and control. How come its taken me three weeks to find it on the market despite searching for pool?
Great game! Although after the update the 'call shot' screen is corrupt. Still playable though. HTC Sensation.

Its ok when it works but it seems that it only works when it wants i wouldn't have bought it had i known however its awesome on i phone
